My baby was 15 days old and he had passed blood in stool. This is due to providing formula feed (Similac advanced) along with my feed (as my feed was  insufficient). We immediately consulted the doctor and he changed the formula feed to Nutramigen. The blood in the stool has stopped but however I observed that he had discomfort in digestion and he started to mourn, when I took him to doctor I understood that he is not only intolerant to lactose but also to cow's milk protein. Simultaneously I had to stop consuming milk and curds as the baby is not able to digest. This has resolved the feed issue.
